attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC should be made more accountable & independent. The BBC ‘Have your say’ scheme is corrupt and operates a back-door method of censorship. The censorship comes in the form of delaying, the release of comments which they do not agree with, and then only release them moments before the voting closes, so the comments cannot be recommended. In addition, it would appear they break the own rules (publishing comment’s that have obviously been copied) in order to promote their own point of view. 

At 12:59 on Thursday 13/11/08 submitted a comment on ‘Should UK troops withdraw from Afghanistan?’ Now  it’s 11:00 on Sunday 16/11/08 my comments are ‘awaiting moderation’ The number of comments published 1140 of which 60% of these were written after mine had been submitted. In addition looking through the last 45 comments published 8 (17%) had copied material contained within them! This is not an isolated incident. I have tried to complain on several occasions, but each time met with a wall of silence.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
